snippet.title: Apocalypse Express - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Check the game out on steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3223160/Apocalypse_Express/

We have been developing Apocalypse Express for more than 2 years and we are proud to present to you our first trailer!

Apocalypse Express is an action management Roguelike in which the player conducts, upgrades and repairs different parts of the train through endless waves of enemies in a post-apocalyptic setting.

Join our community discord: https://discord.gg/pWWcxm3Xew
